boardgame.name: Battleship Galaxies
Battleship Galaxies: The Saturn Offensive Game Set
boardgame.description: Battleship Galaxies is a space combat miniatures game that is a distant cousin to the original Battleship game. The two opposing forces represented in the game, the human Intergalactic Space Navy and the alien Wretcheridians, are represented by 20 starship miniatures. There are figures for several different ship types and each has an individual reference card that defines the characteristics (e.g., weapons, movement, shields) of that ship._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is scenario driven and each scenario defines the goal of the game as well as the initial setup of the starfield hex board. Each turn, players have a certain number of energy points that can be spent to perform actions such as movement or firing. Combat is resolved by rolling special dice: a 10-sided die with letters and an eight-sided die with numbers. The resulting letter-number combination is compared to the target ship_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s reference card to determine the result. Hits on a ship are indicated by placing colored pegs in the figure_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s base._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: D6G Ep 84: Flames of War D-Day, Battleship Galaxies detailed review.
Season 3: Episode #2 Six Buttons Fighting For Their Lives

Wizards of the Coast (WOC 169212040) Hunt. Destroy. Win. Outsmart and outmaneuver your enemy with courage, instinct and strategy as the theater of battle launches into the vast reaches of space. The Saturn Offensive When Saturn’s mining settlement is attacked by warmongering aliens known as The Wretcheridians, the newly-commissioned First Fleet of the Intergalactic Space Navy races back from the edges of the solar system to mount a fierce defense against the invaders. Outgunned and outnumbered, the brave young ISN officers strategically drive the battle deep into the rings of Saturn to begin a deadly game of seek and destroy. Command the ISN fleet and defend the settlement. Or lead the attack as the commander of the ruthless Wretcheridian invaders.

Wizards of the Coast (WOC 169212040) Battleship Galaxies is a tactical strategy space battling game inspired by the classic game of seek and destroy. Play as either the Intergalactic Space Navy, defenders of Earth and its home galaxy, or as the Wretcheridians, merciless alien invaders who shoot to kill and take no prisoners. Use customized ship and tactic cards to build your fleet and engage your opponents. Choose from solo ships or squadrons in a variety of sizes, strengths, weapons, special powers and more. Select one of five unique missions, each representing a pivotal battle between these epic forces. Or, after you’ve played several games, you may want to create your own missions and variations. In this futuristic hunt in the darkness, it’s going to take skill, ingenuity and guts to outmaneuver the enemy.

Brand New shrink wrapped copy of Battleship Galaxies Note: Assuming the buyer is willing I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll try to complete all paperwork required by the BGG Market Place on the day of purchase and have the item packed and shipped on the next working day. Postage within the UK will normally be by Interparcel/Hermes (3-5 working days) as the item weighs over 2Kg unless otherwise agreed with a charge of £5.99 for this item. I am happy to post by Collect+ at £4.99. (see http://www.collectplus.co.uk/faqs) This service is good value and offers more flexibility on collection but make sure you understand what it is before opting for it! There is the option of first class post and faster courier may be available if required. If you want to make multiple purchases contact me and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll consolidate postage. I will ship items to Europe, price to be agreed on request. On items under 2Kg postage can still be quite reasonable. It gets more expensive if a courier has to be used. Thanks for looking. Barry

Condition - New in shrink-wrap. Payment by PayPal in advance or cash on pickup. For PayPal, the account MUST be a registered US address and MUST match the buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s BGG Marketplace address. For shipping this is considered a very large size game. The following options are available for delivery within the continental United States: 1) Local pickup in the San Jose, California area (no cost) 2) USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate - $6.95 (small), $13.10 (medium), or $17.90 (large), depending on game size. Generally very small games fit in the small box, small or medium in the medium box, and large in the large box. Box fits for some games are very snug, allowing minimal protective padding - if this shipping option is picked for such games seller assumes no responsibility for damage during transit. 3) USPS Parcel Select Ground / Non-Flat Rate Priority - varies, usually only cheaper than Flat Rate Priority for small and very light weight games (under 2 pounds), an additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. 4) FedEx Ground - varies, usually from $12 for short distance shipments of light weight games to $30 for heavy games (or multiple games up to 10 pounds) long distance shipments. This is usually the cheapest option for very large games. An additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. While expensive, this is the best method if damage during transit is a concern, as all items will be packed in boxes sufficiently sized for protective materials. Shipping rates to Alaska or Hawaii will be higher for FedEx. Games will not be shipped by any method other than a shipping box, nor unboxed or in less than complete condition, please do not ask.
